content.question: The writer wants to combine sentences 9 and 10 into a single sentence to make the passage clearer and more concise. Which of the following versions of “homes...in others” most effectively accomplishes this goal?

choices.label: homes, either because they do not meet zoning regulations or because
homes, which do not meet zoning regulations, and
homes that do not meet zoning regulations;
homes, those that do not meet zoning regulations or those in which

content.answer: homes, either because they do not meet zoning regulations or because

skill.text: Skill 8.B: Write sentences that clearly convey ideas and arguments.
